document.full_text: wireless chip maker qualcomm inc posted better than expected quarterly results and raised its full-year financial targets on improving demand for advanced phones, and its shares rose 5 percent.
document.title: qualcomm beats street, raises 2011 targets
lines_and_colors: wireless chip maker qualcomm inc posted better than expected quarterly results and raised its full-year financial targets on improving demand for advanced phones, and its shares rose 5 percent.
